options.content: # CONSULTA ${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00 ATÈ ${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*)
FROM hd_chamado hc
join hd_situacao hs on(hs.cdsituacao = hc.cdsituacao)
join hd_tipochamado ht on(ht.cdtipochamado = hc.cdtipochamado)
join hd_localidade loc on(loc.cdlocalidade = hc.cdlocalidade) 
where 1=1
and hc.cdsituacao = '3'

select count(distinct(cham.cdchamado))
from hd_chamado cham 
join hd_situacao hs on(hs.cdsituacao = cham.cdsituacao)
join hd_localidade loc on(loc.cdlocalidade = cham.cdlocalidade) 
join ad_usuario usu on (usu.cdusuario=cham.cdresponsavel) 
join hd_acompanhamento hda on (hda.cdchamado=cham.cdchamado) 
where 1=1
and cham.dtchamado BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
and hs.cdsituacao = 8

select count(DISTINCT(cham.cdchamado))
from hd_chamado cham 
join ad_usuario usu on (usu.cdusuario=cham.cdresponsavel) 
join ad_cliente c on (c.cdcliente=cham.cdcliente) 
where 1=1 
and cdsituacao in ('3','2') 
and DATEDIFF(mi,cham.dtprevisaotermino,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) > 0

SELECT count(*)
FROM hd_chamado hc
join hd_situacao hs on(hs.cdsituacao = hc.cdsituacao)
join hd_tipochamado ht on(ht.cdtipochamado = hc.cdtipochamado)
join hd_localidade loc on(loc.cdlocalidade = hc.cdlocalidade) 
where 1=1
and hc.cdsituacao = '5'

select count(DISTINCT(cham.cdchamado)) 
from hd_chamado cham join ad_usuario usu on (usu.cdusuario=cham.cdresponsavel) 
join ad_cliente c on (c.cdcliente=cham.cdcliente) 
join hd_acompanhamento hda on (hda.cdchamado=cham.cdchamado)
where 1=1 and cham.cdsituacao = '2'

select count(distinct(cham.cdchamado))
from hd_chamado cham 
join hd_situacao hs on(hs.cdsituacao = cham.cdsituacao)
join hd_localidade loc on(loc.cdlocalidade = cham.cdlocalidade) 
join ad_usuario usu on (usu.cdusuario=cham.cdresponsavel) 
join hd_acompanhamento hda on (hda.cdchamado=cham.cdchamado) 
where 1=1
and cham.dtchamado BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
and hs.cdsituacao = 7

select count(DISTINCT(cham.cdchamado))
from hd_chamado cham join ad_usuario usu on (usu.cdusuario=cham.cdresponsavel)
join ad_cliente c on (c.cdcliente=cham.cdcliente)
join hd_acompanhamento hda on (hda.cdchamado=cham.cdchamado)
where 1=1 and cham.cdsituacao in ('3','5') and fgchamadoreaberto IS NOT NULL

select
cdchamado as "CHAMADO",
CASE
	WHEN SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%[0-9][0-9].[0-9][0-9][0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6) like '%[0-9][0-9].[0-9][0-9][0-9]%' then SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%[0-9][0-9].[0-9][0-9][0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6)
	WHEN SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6) like '%[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]%' then SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6)
	WHEN SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%[0-9][0-9].[0-9][0-9][0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6) not like '%[0-9][0-9].[0-9][0-9][0-9]%' then 'SEM OP'
	WHEN SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6) not like '%[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]%' then 'SEM OP'
END as OP,
nmcliente as "EMPRESA",
nmtitulochamado as "TITULO",
SUBSTRING(nmcategoria, 15, 100) as "CATEGORIA",
CONVERT(date, dtchamado) as "ABERTURA",
nmusuario as "RESPONSAVEL"

from hd_chamado
inner join ad_cliente on ad_cliente.cdcliente = hd_chamado.cdcliente
inner join hd_categoria on hd_categoria.cdcategoria = hd_chamado.cdcategoria
inner join ad_usuario on ad_usuario.cdusuario = hd_chamado.cdresponsavel

where dttermino BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
and cdsituacao = '7'
and hd_categoria.cdcategoriasuperior = '1098'
order by cdchamado

select hd_categoria.nmcategoria as "CATEGORIA",
count(cdchamado) as "QUANTIDADE"
from hd_chamado
inner join hd_categoria on hd_categoria.cdcategoria = hd_chamado.cdcategoria
where dttermino BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
and hd_categoria.cdcategoriasuperior = '1098'
and cdsituacao = '7'
group by hd_categoria.nmcategoria

select
cdchamado as CHAMADO,
CASE
	WHEN SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%[0-9][0-9].[0-9][0-9][0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6) like '%[0-9][0-9].[0-9][0-9][0-9]%' then SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%[0-9][0-9].[0-9][0-9][0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6)
	WHEN SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6) like '%[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]%' then SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6)
	WHEN SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%[0-9][0-9].[0-9][0-9][0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6) not like '%[0-9][0-9].[0-9][0-9][0-9]%' then 'SEM OP'
	WHEN SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6) not like '%[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]%' then 'SEM OP'
END as OP,
nmcliente as EMPRESA,
nmtitulochamado as TITULO,
SUBSTRING(nmcategoria, 15, 100) as CATEGORIA,
CONVERT(date, dtchamado) as ABERTURA,
nmusuario as RESPONSAVEL
from hd_chamado
inner join ad_cliente on ad_cliente.cdcliente = hd_chamado.cdcliente
inner join hd_categoria on hd_categoria.cdcategoria = hd_chamado.cdcategoria
inner join ad_usuario on ad_usuario.cdusuario = hd_chamado.cdresponsavel
where cdsituacao not in ('7', '8')
and hd_categoria.cdcategoriasuperior = '1098'
order by CHAMADO

select ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN
hc.cdalternativa=1 or
hc.cdalternativa=5 or
hc.cdalternativa=2 or
hc.cdalternativa=3 THEN 1 END),0) as "Quantidade"
from ps_resposta hch
INNER JOIN ps_respostaalternativa hc ON hch.cdresposta = hc.cdresposta
where dtresposta BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59' and cdchamado is not null

select ((select COUNT(cdchamado)
from hd_chamado
where dttermino BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
and (cdsituacao = '7' or cdsituacao = '5')) - ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN
hc.cdalternativa=1 or
hc.cdalternativa=5 or
hc.cdalternativa=2 or
hc.cdalternativa=3 THEN 1 END),0))
from ps_resposta hch
INNER JOIN ps_respostaalternativa hc ON hch.cdresposta = hc.cdresposta
where dtresposta BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
and cdchamado is not null

select ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN
hc.cdalternativa=1 or
hc.cdalternativa=5 or
hc.cdalternativa=2 or
hc.cdalternativa=3 THEN 1 END),0) as "Quantidade"
from ps_resposta hch
INNER JOIN ps_respostaalternativa hc ON hch.cdresposta = hc.cdresposta
where hch.dtresposta BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59' 
and hch.cdatendimento is not null

select (count(*) - (select ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN
hc.cdalternativa=1 or
hc.cdalternativa=5 or
hc.cdalternativa=2 or
hc.cdalternativa=3 THEN 1 END),0) as "Quantidade"
from ps_resposta hch
INNER JOIN ps_respostaalternativa hc ON hch.cdresposta = hc.cdresposta
where hch.dtresposta BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
and hch.cdatendimento is not null))
from hd_sessaoatendimento
where dtresposta BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'

select
nmusuario as "Colaborador",
ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN hc.cdalternativa=1 THEN 1 END),0) as "Ótimo",
ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN hc.cdalternativa=5 THEN 1 END),0) as "Bom",
ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN hc.cdalternativa=2 THEN 1 END),0) as "Regular",
ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN hc.cdalternativa=3 THEN 1 END),0) as "Ruim",
ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN hc.cdalternativa in (1, 2, 3, 5) THEN 1 END),0) as "Total"
from ps_resposta hch
INNER JOIN hd_chamado hdc ON hch.cdchamado = hdc.cdchamado
INNER JOIN ad_usuario adu ON adu.cdusuario = hdc.cdresponsavel
INNER JOIN ps_respostaalternativa hc ON hch.cdresposta = hc.cdresposta
where hch.dtresposta BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
and hch.cdchamado is not null
group by nmusuario
order by "Ótimo" desc, "Bom" desc, "Regular" desc, "Colaborador"

select
nmusuario as "Colaborador",
ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN hc.cdalternativa=1 THEN 1 END),0) as "Ótimo",
ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN hc.cdalternativa=5 THEN 1 END),0) as "Bom",
ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN hc.cdalternativa=2 THEN 1 END),0) as "Regular",
ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN hc.cdalternativa=3 THEN 1 END),0) as "Ruim",
ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN hc.cdalternativa in (1, 2, 3, 5) THEN 1 END),0) as "Total"
from ps_resposta hch
INNER JOIN hd_sessaoatendimento hds ON hch.cdatendimento = hds.cdatendimento
INNER JOIN ad_usuario adu ON adu.cdusuario = hds.cdatendente
INNER JOIN ps_respostaalternativa hc ON hch.cdresposta = hc.cdresposta
where hch.dtresposta  between '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
and hch.cdatendimento is not null
group by nmusuario
order by "Ótimo" desc, "Bom" desc, "Regular" desc, "Colaborador"

select cham.cdchamado as "N CHAMADO",
nmusuario as "RESPONSAVEL",
nmcliente as "EMPRESA",
SUBSTRING(dsacompanhamento,25,600) as "MOTIVO"
from hd_chamado cham 
inner join ad_cliente on ad_cliente.cdcliente = cham.cdcliente
join hd_situacao hs on(hs.cdsituacao = cham.cdsituacao)
join hd_localidade loc on(loc.cdlocalidade = cham.cdlocalidade) 
join ad_usuario usu on (usu.cdusuario=cham.cdresponsavel) 
join hd_acompanhamento hda on (hda.cdchamado=cham.cdchamado) 
where 1=1
and cham.dtchamado BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
and hs.cdsituacao = 8
and dsacompanhamento like '%Chamado cancelado%'

select hs.nmsituacao as "TIPO",
     COUNT(hs.nmsituacao) as "QUANTIDADE"
from hd_chamado cham
join hd_situacao hs on (hs.cdsituacao = cham.cdsituacao) 
where 1=1
and dttermino between '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
and hs.cdsituacao in ('7','8')
group by  hs.nmsituacao

SELECT abertos.data as time,
       encerrados.data as time,
       ISNULL(abertos."data", encerrados."data"), ISNULL("abertos",0) as "abertos", ISNULL("encerrados",0) as "encerrados"
FROM
(SELECT CONVERT(date,dtchamado) as "data", count(cdchamado) as "abertos"
FROM hd_chamado
WHERE dtchamado between '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
GROUP BY CONVERT(date,dtchamado)) as abertos
FULL OUTER JOIN
(SELECT CONVERT(date,dttermino) as "data", count(cdchamado) as "encerrados"
FROM hd_chamado
WHERE dttermino between '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
GROUP BY CONVERT(date,dttermino)) as encerrados
ON abertos."data"=encerrados."data"

select convert(date, getdate()) as time, 
hd_motivosuspenso.nmmotivosuspenso, COUNT(hd_motivosuspenso.nmmotivosuspenso) AS qtdSuspenso
FROM hd_chamado
LEFT JOIN hd_suspenso on hd_suspenso.cdchamado = hd_chamado.cdchamado and hd_suspenso.dtreativacao is null
LEFT JOIN hd_situacao ON hd_situacao.cdsituacao = hd_chamado.cdsituacao
LEFT JOIN hd_motivosuspenso on hd_motivosuspenso.cdmotivosuspenso = hd_suspenso.cdmotivosuspenso
WHERE hd_motivosuspenso.nmmotivosuspenso is not null
and hd_situacao.nmsituacao = 'Suspenso'
GROUP BY hd_motivosuspenso.nmmotivosuspenso
ORDER BY qtdSuspenso desc

select nmusuario as "COLABORADOR", cast(COUNT(cdresponsavel) as integer) as "ENCERRADOS",
(select cast(COUNT(cdresponsavel) as integer)
from hd_chamado hdc
INNER JOIN ad_usuario adu ON hdc.cdresponsavel = adu.cdusuario
where (cdsituacao = '2' or cdsituacao = '3') and adu.nmusuario=adu1.nmusuario
group by cdresponsavel, nmusuario) as "EM ATENDIMENTO"
from hd_chamado hdc
INNER JOIN ad_usuario adu1 ON hdc.cdresponsavel = adu1.cdusuario
where (cdsituacao = '7' AND hdc.cdcliente != '6' and hdc.cdorigem != '4') and (dttermino between '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59')
group by nmusuario order by ENCERRADOS desc

select convert(date, getdate()) as time, 
count(distinct(cham.cdchamado)) as value,
loc.nmlocalidade as metric
from hd_chamado cham 
join hd_situacao hs on(hs.cdsituacao = cham.cdsituacao)
join hd_localidade loc on(loc.cdlocalidade = cham.cdlocalidade) 
join ad_usuario usu on (usu.cdusuario=cham.cdresponsavel) 
join hd_acompanhamento hda on (hda.cdchamado=cham.cdchamado) 
where 1=1
and cham.dtchamado between '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
group by loc.nmlocalidade

select convert(date, getdate()) as time, 
hdo.nmorigem,
count(cham.cdchamado)
FROM hd_chamado cham
join hd_origem hdo on(hdo.cdorigem = cham.cdorigem)
WHERE 1=1
AND dttermino BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
group by hdo.nmorigem

select convert(date, getdate()) as time, 
      ad_uf.sguf, 
      cast(COUNT(hdc.cdcliente) as integer)
from hd_chamado hdc
INNER JOIN ad_cliente ON hdc.cdcliente = ad_cliente.cdcliente
INNER JOIN ad_cidade ON ad_cliente.cdcidade = ad_cidade.cdcidade
INNER JOIN ad_uf ON ad_cidade.cduf = ad_uf.cduf
where (ad_uf.sguf != null or ad_uf.sguf != '')
and (hdc.cdsituacao = '7' or hdc.cdsituacao = '5')
and hdc.dttermino between '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
group by ad_uf.sguf

select convert(date, getdate()) as time, 
CASE
when cdtipochamado=32 then 'Incidente'
when cdtipochamado=33 then 'Requisição'
when cdtipochamado=38 then 'Não Classificado'
when cdtipochamado=39 then 'Mudança'
when cdtipochamado=18 then '[Depreciado]'
END as "Tipo de Chamado",
COUNT(cdtipochamado) as "Quantidade"
from hd_chamado
where 1=1
and cdsituacao = '7'
and (dttermino BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59')
group by cdtipochamado
order by "Quantidade" desc

select convert(date, getdate()) as time, 
count(distinct(cham.cdchamado)) as value,
hs.nmsituacao as metric
from hd_chamado cham 
join hd_situacao hs on(hs.cdsituacao = cham.cdsituacao)
join hd_localidade loc on(loc.cdlocalidade = cham.cdlocalidade) 
join ad_usuario usu on (usu.cdusuario=cham.cdresponsavel) 
join hd_acompanhamento hda on (hda.cdchamado=cham.cdchamado) 
where 1=1
and cham.dtchamado between '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
group by hs.nmsituacao

select TOP 10 ad_cliente.nmcliente as "EMPRESA", cast(COUNT(hdc.cdcliente) as integer) as "QUANTIDADE",
ROUND(cast(COUNT(hdc.cdcliente) as float) /
CAST((select cast(COUNT(hdc.cdcliente) as integer)
from hd_chamado hdc
where (hdc.cdsituacao = '7' or hdc.cdsituacao = '5') and hdc.dttermino between '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59') as float)*100, 2) as "PORCENTAGEM"
from hd_chamado hdc
INNER JOIN ad_cliente ON hdc.cdcliente = ad_cliente.cdcliente
where (hdc.cdsituacao = '7' or hdc.cdsituacao = '5') and hdc.dttermino between '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
group by ad_cliente.nmcliente
order by "QUANTIDADE" desc

SELECT nmcategoria + ' > ' + t2.categoria AS CATEGORIA, t2.QUANTIDADE FROM
(SELECT nmcategoria + ' > ' + t1.categoria AS CATEGORIA, hd_categoria.cdcategoriasuperior, t1.quantidade FROM
(SELECT TOP 15 nmcategoria as CATEGORIA, cdcategoriasuperior, COUNT(cdchamado) as QUANTIDADE
FROM hd_chamado
INNER JOIN hd_categoria ON hd_categoria.cdcategoria = hd_chamado.cdcategoria
WHERE (cdsituacao = '7' OR cdsituacao = '5')
AND dttermino between '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 00:00:00' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD} 23:59:59'
GROUP BY hd_categoria.nmcategoria, hd_categoria.cdcategoriasuperior
ORDER BY QUANTIDADE desc) AS t1
INNER JOIN hd_categoria ON hd_categoria.cdcategoria = t1.cdcategoriasuperior) AS t2
INNER JOIN hd_categoria ON hd_categoria.cdcategoria = t2.cdcategoriasuperior

select * from (SELECT hd_chamado.cdchamado as "N CHAMADO", 
ad_cliente.nmcliente as "EMPRESA", 
nmusuario as "RESPONSAVEL", 
hd_chamado.nmtitulochamado as "TITULO",
case 
 WHEN SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%#[0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6) like '#%' then SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%#[0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6)
 WHEN SUBSTRING(nmtitulochamado, PATINDEX('%#[0-9]%', nmtitulochamado), 6) not like '#%' then 'SEM ATIVIDADE'
END as ATIVIDADE
   FROM hd_chamado
   LEFT JOIN ad_usuario ON hd_chamado.cdresponsavel = ad_usuario.cdusuario
   LEFT JOIN hd_situacao ON hd_situacao.cdsituacao = hd_chamado.cdsituacao
   LEFT JOIN ad_cliente ON hd_chamado.cdcliente = ad_cliente.cdcliente
   LEFT JOIN hd_suspenso on hd_suspenso.cdchamado = hd_chamado.cdchamado and hd_suspenso.dtreativacao is null
   LEFT JOIN hd_motivosuspenso on hd_motivosuspenso.cdmotivosuspenso = hd_suspenso.cdmotivosuspenso
WHERE 1=1
and nmsituacao = 'Suspenso'
and (hd_suspenso.cdmotivosuspenso = '5' or hd_suspenso.cdmotivosuspenso = '9'))  dados
where 1=1
order by "N CHAMADO" asc
